item.title: Kristen add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Just because you're naked doesn't mean you're sexy. Just because you're cynical doesn't mean you're cool." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "If you believe in peace, act peacefully; if you believe in love, acting lovingly; if you believe every which way, then act every which way, that's perfectly valid - but don't go out trying to sell your beliefs to the system. You end up contradicting what you profess to believe in, and you set a bum example. If you want to change the world, change yourself." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I shared a vagrant optimism that some of us were making real progress, that we had taken an honest road, and that the best of us would inevitably make it over the top. At the same time, I felt that the life we were leading was a lost cause, that we were all actor, kidding ourselves on a senseless odyssey. It was the tension between those two poles - a restless idealism on one hand and a sense of impending doom on the other - that kept me going." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Dylan Thomas
item.description: "Somebody's boring me. I think it's me." -- Dylan Thomas

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Tom Wolfe
item.description: "Put your good where it will do the most!" -- Tom Wolfe

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Tom Wolfe
item.description: "Everybody is going to be what they are, and whatever they are, there's not going to be anything to apologize about." -- Tom Wolfe

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Andy Warhol
item.description: "They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself." -- Andy Warhol

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Andy Warhol
item.description: "I think everybody should be nice to everybody." -- Andy Warhol

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Andy Warhol
item.description: "I think having land and not ruining it is the most beautiful art that anybody could ever want." -- Andy Warhol

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Edward Abbey
item.description: "Society is like a stew. If you don't stir it up every once in a while then a layer of scum floats to the top." -- Edward Abbey

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Edward Abbey
item.description: "Wilderness is not a luxury but a necessity of the human spirit, and as vital to our lives as water and good bread. A civilization which destroys what little remains of the wild, the spare, the original, is cutting itself off from its origins and betraying the principle of civilization itself." -- Edward Abbey

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Edward Abbey
item.description: "Benedicto: May your trails be crooked, winding, lonesome, dangerous, leading to the most amazing view. May your mountains rise into and above the clouds. May your rivers flow without end, meandering through pastoral valleys tinkling with bells, past temples and castles and poets towers into a dark primeval forest where tigers belch and monkeys howl, through miasmal and mysterious swamps and down into a desert of red rock, blue mesas, domes and pinnacles and grottos of endless stone, and down again into a deep vast ancient unknown chasm where bars of sunlight blaze on profiled cliffs, where deer walk across the white sand beaches, where storms come and go as lightning clangs upon the high crags, where something strange and more beautiful and more full of wonder than your deepest dreams waits for you -- beyond that next turning of the canyon walls." -- Edward Abbey

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Luxury is not a necessity to me, but beautiful and good things are." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "People living deeply have no fear of death." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Kristen add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Kristen add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Kristen add a quote by John Barth
item.description: "Everyone is necessarily the hero of his own life story." -- John Barth

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "I'll let you be in my dreams if I can be in yours" -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and gets to bed at night, and in between he does what he wants to do." -- Bob Dylan
